Package net.kyori.adventure.platform.modcommon

package net.kyori.adventure.platform.modcommon
Implementation of Adventure on Minecraft using various mod loaders.

There are both server- and clientside entry points for Adventure, in MinecraftServerAudiences and MinecraftClientAudiences

  • Class
    Description
    AdventureCommandSourceStack
    An interface applied to CommandSourceStack to allow sending Components.
    ComponentArgumentType
    An argument that takes JSON-format text.
    ComponentArgumentType.Format
    Supported text formats for registering components.
    EntityHoverEventSource
    An interface providing default implementations of HoverEventSource methods.
    IdentifiedAtRuntime
    Classes extending this interface will have the IdentifiedAtRuntime.identity() implementation provided at runtime via Mixin or otherwise.
    KeyArgumentType
    An argument that will be decoded as a Key.
    MinecraftAudiences
    Common operations in both the client and server environments.
    MinecraftClientAudiences
    Access the client's player as an Audience.
    MinecraftClientAudiences.Builder
    Build a MinecraftClientAudiences instance.
    MinecraftServerAudiences
    Provides Audience instances for a specific server instance.
    MinecraftServerAudiences.Builder
    Builder for MinecraftServerAudiences with custom attributes.
    ModResourcePackCallbacks
    Resource pack callbacks for the modded environment.
